value.title: StarCraft 2: AGGRESSIVE ZERG SWARMS! (TY vs Armani)
value.excerpt: Awesome best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between TY and Armani. While I've casted quite a far TY games at this point, Armani is a name that many people are not as familiar with. value.title: StarCraft 2: Goblin MASSES PHOENIXES vs Reynor! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Phoenixes are not a very common unit currently at the professional level of StarCraft 2 in the Zerg versus Protoss matchup. We see them from time to time, but these days it is all about Void Rays and Carriers. In this video I cast a best-of-3 series of Zerg versus Protoss between Reynor and Goblin.
